00048    template < class PairInteraction, class ExternalInteraction >
00049    class McPairExternalPerturbation : public LinearPerturbation<McSystem>
00050    {
00051 
00052    public:
00053 
00057       McPairExternalPerturbation(McSystem& system);
00058 
00062       virtual ~McPairExternalPerturbation();
00063 
00069       virtual void readParam(std::istream& in);
00070  
00075       virtual void setParameter();
00076       
00083       virtual double parameter(int i) const;
00084 
00089       virtual double derivative(int i) const;
00090       
00091       PairInteraction& pairInteraction() const;
00092       
00093       ExternalInteraction& externalInteraction() const;

00099 
00101       mutable PairInteraction* pairInteractionPtr_;
00102 
00104       mutable ExternalInteraction* externalInteractionPtr_;
00105       
00106       /*
00107       Number of perturbation parameters associated with a System.
00108       nParameters = 2 for McPairExternalPerturbation.
00109       */
00110       int nParameters_;

00133    /*
00134    * Read epsilon(0,1) and external parameter from file
00135    */
00136    template < class PairInteraction, class ExternalInteraction >
00137    void McPairExternalPerturbation<PairInteraction, ExternalInteraction>::readParam(std::istream& in)
00138    { 
00139       Perturbation::readParameters(in);
00140       nParameters_ = Perturbation::getNParameters();
00141    }

00143    /* 
00144    */
00145    template < class PairInteraction, class ExternalInteraction >
00146    PairInteraction& McPairExternalPerturbation<PairInteraction, ExternalInteraction>::pairInteraction() const
00147    {
00148       if (pairInteractionPtr_ == 0) {
00149          McPairPotential* pairPtr = &(system().pairPotential());
00150          McPairPotentialImpl< PairInteraction >* implPtr = 0;
00151          implPtr = dynamic_cast< McPairPotentialImpl< PairInteraction >* >(pairPtr);
00152          if (implPtr == 0) {
00153             UTIL_THROW("Failed dynamic cast of McPairPotential");
00154          }
00155          pairInteractionPtr_ = &implPtr->interaction();
00156       }
00157       return *pairInteractionPtr_;
00158    }
00159    
00160    /* 
00161    */
00162    template < class PairInteraction, class ExternalInteraction >
00163    ExternalInteraction& McPairExternalPerturbation<PairInteraction, ExternalInteraction>::externalInteraction() const
00164    {
00165       if (externalInteractionPtr_ == 0) {
00166          ExternalPotential* externalPtr = &(system().externalPotential());
00167          ExternalPotentialImpl< ExternalInteraction >* implPtr = 0;
00168          implPtr = dynamic_cast< ExternalPotentialImpl< ExternalInteraction >* >(externalPtr);
00169          if (implPtr == 0) {
00170             UTIL_THROW("Failed dynamic cast of ExternalPotential");
00171          }
00172          externalInteractionPtr_ = &implPtr->interaction();
00173       }
00174       return *externalInteractionPtr_;
00175    }

00178    /*
00179    * Set the parameter epsilon(0,1) and external parameter for this McSystem.
00180    */
00181    template < class PairInteraction, class ExternalInteraction >
00182    void McPairExternalPerturbation<PairInteraction, ExternalInteraction>::setParameter()
00183    { 
00184       pairInteraction().setEpsilon(0, 1, parameter_[0]);
00185       externalInteraction().setExternalParameter(parameter_[1]);
00186    }
00187 
00188    /* 
00189    * i = 0: Get the epsilon(0,1) from the parent System.
00190    * i = 1: Get the externalParameter from the parent System.
00191    */
00192    template < class PairInteraction, class ExternalInteraction >
00193    double McPairExternalPerturbation<PairInteraction, ExternalInteraction>::parameter(int i) const
00194    {  
00195       if (i >= nParameters_) {
00196          UTIL_THROW("perturbation parameter index is out of bounds");
00197       }
00198       double param = 0.0;
00199       if (i == 0) {
00200         param = pairInteraction().epsilon(0, 1); 
00201       } else if (i == 1) {
00202         param = externalInteraction().externalParameter(); 
00203       } 
00204       return param;
00205    }
00206 
00207    /*
00208    * i = 0: Returns pair energy for unlike pairs / (kT*epsilon(0,1))
00209    * i = 1: Returns external potential energy / ( kT *external parameter )
00210    */
00211    template < class PairInteraction, class ExternalInteraction >
00212    double McPairExternalPerturbation<PairInteraction, ExternalInteraction>::derivative(int i) const
00213    {  
00214       // Preconditions
00215       if (i >= nParameters_) {
00216          UTIL_THROW("perturbation parameter index is out of bounds");
00217       }
00218       double deriv = 0.0;
00219       if ( i == 0 ) {
00220          if (fabs(parameter_[i] - parameter(i)) > 1.0E-8) {
00221             UTIL_THROW("Pair perturbation parameter is not set correctly");
00222          }
00223          double pairEnergy, rsq;
00224          Atom  *jAtomPtr, *kAtomPtr;
00225          int    nNeighbor, nInCell;
00226          int    ic, nc, j, k, jId, kId, jType, kType;
00227          // Loop over cells
00228          pairEnergy = 0.0;
00229          nc = system().pairPotential().cellList().totCells();
00230          for (ic = 0; ic < nc; ++ic) {
00231 
00232             // Get array of neighbors_
00233             system().pairPotential().cellList().getCellNeighbors(ic, neighbors_, nInCell);
00234             nNeighbor = neighbors_.size();
00235 
00236             // Loop over primary atoms in this cell
00237             for (j = 0; j < nInCell; ++j) {
00238                jAtomPtr = neighbors_[j];
00239                jId      = jAtomPtr->id();
00240                jType    = jAtomPtr->typeId();
00241 
00242                // Loop over secondary atoms in this and neighboring cells
00243                for (k = 0; k < nNeighbor; ++k) {
00244                   kAtomPtr = neighbors_[k];
00245                   kId      = kAtomPtr->id();
00246                   kType    = kAtomPtr->typeId();
00247 
00248                   // Count each pair only once 
00249                   if (kId > jId && jType != kType) {
00250 
00251                      // Exclude masked pairs
00252                      if (!jAtomPtr->mask().isMasked(*kAtomPtr)) {
00253 
00254                         rsq = system().boundary().
00255                               distanceSq(jAtomPtr->position(), kAtomPtr->position());
00256                         pairEnergy += pairInteraction().
00257                               energy(rsq, jAtomPtr->typeId(), kAtomPtr->typeId());
00258 
00259                      }
00260 
00261                   }
00262 
00263                 } // secondary atoms
00264 
00265             } // primary atoms
00266 
00267          } // cells
00268 
00269          // Multiply by the temperature factor.
00270          if (system().energyEnsemble().isIsothermal()) {
00271              pairEnergy *= system().energyEnsemble().beta();
00272          } else {
00273             UTIL_THROW("Non isothermal ensemble for McPairPerturbation.");
00274          }
00275 
00276          deriv = pairEnergy/parameter_[i];
00277       } else if ( i == 1 ) {
00278          if (fabs(parameter_[i] - parameter(i)) > 1.0E-8) {
00279             UTIL_THROW("External perturbation parameter is not set correctly");
00280          }
00281          double externalEnergy;
00282          System::MoleculeIterator molIter;
00283          Molecule::AtomIterator atomIter;
00284 
00285          externalEnergy = 0.0;
00286 
00287          for (int iSpec=0; iSpec < system().simulation().nSpecies(); ++iSpec){
00288              for (system().begin(iSpec, molIter); molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter){
00289                   for (molIter->begin(atomIter); atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00290                       externalEnergy += system().externalPotential().energy(atomIter->position(), atomIter->typeId());
00291                   }
00292              }
00293          }
00294 
00295          // Multiply by the temperature factor.
00296          if (system().energyEnsemble().isIsothermal()) {
00297             externalEnergy *= system().energyEnsemble().beta();
00298          } else {
00299             UTIL_THROW("Non isothermal ensemble");
00300          }
00301 
00302          deriv = externalEnergy/parameter_[i];
00303 
00304       } 
00305       return deriv;
00306 
00307    }
00308    
00309 }
